titles.title: Campaign Accountability Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to repeal the limitation on party expenditures on behalf of candidates in general elections.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Committee on Rules and Administration. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 4/11/2007--Introduced. Campaign Accountability Act of 2007 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to repeal the limitation on party expenditures on behalf of candidates in general elections.
